Reviews.Title: “Relatively big room, attached to shopping mall with Spanish brands, away from downtown”

Reviews.Content: recently returned fabulous holiday rome stayed jolly villa carpegna rome week previous reviews mentioned hotel residential area approximately 25 min walk vatican rooms numerous reviews mentioned definitely small side limited wardrobe facilities longer stays said though rooms hotel general spotlessly clean reception staff spoke excellent english felt hotel probably business particularly friendly disappointed breakfast probably one disappointing breakfasts 4 european hotel though adequate selection cereals bread choices ie fruit cold scrambled egg bacon limited selection cheese certainly idea excellent breakfast pool excellent spotlessly clean quiet lovely place relax particularly day sight seeing taxis varied considerably price reasonable actually quite expensive main activities back hotel bus service good quite happy use day taxis evening also found excellent restaurant five minutes walk hotel used couple evenings highly recommended food service choice food atmosphere excellent would probably use hotel

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel, attached to mall, easy to get around Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: SJofMexico
Reviews.Content: organized group 16 stay second week july despite small early reservation stay proved outstanding fifth trip rome stayed hotels downtown outskirts hotel within 15 minute walk vatican residential neighborhood considering high season paying 110 similar nice hotel downtown would easily 200 euro even taxi could downtown within 1015 minutes 10 euro one easily see good deal key factor hotel modern ac great rooms musty breakfast buffet tasty closeby hotel crowne plaza worn old certainly compare quality jolly gets two thumbs

Reviews.Title: “Good location but fails to impress”

Reviews.Content: took mother rome october first time quite pleased accommodations hotel decor nice rooms great bit small side nice overall restaurant absolute delight food amazing breakfast buffet one best ever hotel also sits hill views great also liked fact located little outside center rome center town must highly recommend staying jolly villa carpegna surrounding neighborhood really nice gives one feeling stay rome
